name: Abaqus-Sp15
tagline: CSE Training Workshops in Engineering Software
body: ## A Short Course for Engineers ##### March 31, April 2, 7, 9, 14, 16 (Tue/Thu) • Noon–2 p.m. • MEL 1001 ABAQUS is a high-powered finite element analysis (FEA) software package used by industrial and academic researchers throughout the world. This short course is designed to introduce you to the fundamentals of the interface and a variety of modeling techniques through engineering exercises and physical models. This course will be offered in April 2015 by [Computational Science and Engineering](http://cse.illinois.edu/) for a fee of $200, intended to recover costs of course development and delivery. Please ask your department office or advisor if research development funds are available to assist you if interested. ### Topics - Outline & Interface - Workflow - Postprocessing - Job Processing/Solver - Meshing & Mesh Conditioning - Loading & Analysis - Material, Yield, & Fracture Models - Section Properties/Composite Objects - Dynamic/Contact FEA - Batch Programming/Transient Solver - Coupling Physics - Command Line Interface/Python Scripting
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
